course_description: All first and second year MD/PhD students will be registered for this class. Attendance at a minimum of six seminars or related program events offered by Georgia Tech and/or Emory is required. Acceptable activities include seminar events, workshops, and doctoral defenses. M2 students may substitute individual meetings with faculty and laboratory meetings for seminars, and may participate in approved graduate level coursework in lieu of the self-directed seminar series.
